name: 凌凱
objective: 本課程使學生具有基礎德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
schedule:
September 17: Interviewing new students, review of last semester's contents, weekend activities
September 24: Lesson 7 - Auxiliary verb "können"
October 1: Lesson 7 - Auxiliary verb "wollen"
October 9: Lesson 7 - Introduction new grammar: Perfekt, dictation
October 16: Lesson 7 - Practicing Perfekt, typical sounds&expressions
October 23: Lesson 7 - Review and test
November 5: Lesson 8 - Jobs and occupations
November 12: Lesson 8 - Introduction new grammar: Dativ
November 19: Lesson 8 - Introducing new grammar: Präteritum (verbs haben/sein)
November 26: Lesson 8 - Talking about the past
December 3: Lesson 8 - Internship, unusual jobs
December 10: Lesson 8 - Review, test
December 17: Lesson 9 - In a foreign city, auxiliary verb "müssen"
December 24: Lesson 9 - Introducing new grammar: Imperativ
December 31: Lesson 9 - Auxiliary verb "dürfen"
January 7: Lesson 9 - Reading brochures, review
January 14: Final exam
scorePolicy:
Class participation: 10%
Assignments: 20%
Quizzes: 10%
Midterm exam: 30%
Final exam: 30%
materials: As a textbook we use "Schritte International 1 & 2". It is a good choice for teaching German because of its systematic training of the four different skills: reading, listening, speaking, and writing. Included are a workbook (used for doing exercises at home) and three audio CDs.
